config_definition.header: These variables may be changed anytime during a run, they control arguments to the batch submit command.

entry.desc: The machine queue in which to submit the job. Default determined in config_machines.xml can be overwritten by testing
The machine wallclock setting. Default determined in config_machines.xml can be overwritten by testing
project for project-sensitive build and run paths, and job scripts
whether the PROJECT value is required on this machine
